title: Saturation WordPress Theme + PSD & DOC (FREE Download)
description:
Saturation WordPress Theme - Professional Worpdress Theme by MyThemeShop Incl. PSD & DOC (FREE Download)



Saturation is a bright and crisp WordPress theme structured like a traditional blog that brings features built to make your blog successful. Featuring our new Google Plus badge widget, search, speed, and ad optimization, and much more, Saturation is a must-have theme.


Saturation Features:

Magazine Style
Saturation WordPress theme includes a sleek featured posts slider, and a dual column magazine layout.

Options Panel
Like all MyThemeShop themes, Saturation includes our custom options panel so you can customize your theme easily.

Integrated Social Media
Promote your site easily using the built in social media buttons, which allow your readers to help promote the content they like from your site.

Shortcodes
Add highlights and features to your posts with a click, using the shortcodes that are included in Saturation.

SEO Optimized
Google is becoming harder and harder for bloggers to deal with, but Saturation makes it simple to get top SEO rankings.

Speed
With lazy loading, optimized code and a clean design, Saturation will put all other themes to shame with its loading time.

Ad Optimized

Show off your best posts with the slick featured posts slider, guaranteed to get more clicks from your readers.

Responsive
Saturation is 100% responsive, meaning it works on any browser or window size. No more tinkering with plugins or half-working themes.
